description:
Get the highly regarded newspaper, The Guardian©, on your HP TouchPad.

The Guardian News Hub is the first app for the TouchPad that enables you to browse the latest news from The Guardian© in an easy and convenient way.

Features:
- Browse the major sections of The Guardian©
- Supports article thumbnails
- Easy navigation between news categories
- View articles in full browser mode
- Share articles via Email, Twitter, and Facebook

A permanent internet connection is required (Edge, 3G, 4G or WiFi).  Application performance may vary depending on the speed of the network connection.

NOTE: This application is developed and published by Dcube Apps.  The Guardian© was not involved in its development, nor is this software endorsed by The Guardian© or its affiliates.
